metadata.purpose: Validate recommended upsell offer and gather implementation details

classic_upsell.validation_intro: Classic Upsell is perfect for getting immediate profit boosts with 80%+ take rates. Let's nail down your implementation details.

questions.text: What will you offer as your Classic Upsell?
questions.help_text: This should be something free or heavily discounted that complements the main purchase

options.label: Complementary Product
options.description: Another product that pairs well with main purchase

options.label: Upgraded Version
options.description: Better version of what they just bought

options.label: Additional Quantity
options.description: More of what they just bought at discount

questions.text: Where will you present this Classic Upsell?
questions.help_text: Front-end = immediately after checkout. Back-end = days/weeks later via email/call

options.label: Front-End (Checkout Page)
options.description: Immediately after they buy, same session

options.label: Front-End (Onboarding)
options.description: During first login or welcome sequence

options.label: Back-End (Email Campaign)
options.description: Days or weeks after purchase via email

options.label: Test Both Front & Back
options.description: Try front-end first, then back-end for non-buyers

questions.text: How seamless can you make the upsell acceptance?
questions.help_text: The easier it is to say yes, the higher your take rate

options.label: One-Click (Card on File)
options.description: Single button click, card already stored

options.label: Checkbox on Same Page
options.description: Add to order before completing checkout

options.label: Separate Checkout Required
options.description: Need to enter payment info again

menu_upsell.validation_intro: Menu Upsell is Hormozi's favorite because it builds trust through unselling. Let's map out your prescription framework.

questions.text: How many products can you prescribe from your menu?
questions.help_text: Menu Upsell requires variety - ideally 4+ options to diagnose and prescribe

questions.text: Are you comfortable UNSELLING (telling customers what they DON'T need)?
questions.help_text: This is the secret weapon of Menu Upsell - builds massive trust

options.label: Very Comfortable
options.description: I already do this, builds trust
examples: Tell clients what won't work for them

options.label: Willing to Learn
options.description: New to me but I see the value

options.label: Somewhat Uncomfortable
options.description: Feels counterintuitive to turn down sales

options.label: Very Uncomfortable
options.description: Want to sell everything to everyone

questions.text: Do you have a framework for diagnosing which product fits which customer?
questions.help_text: Like a doctor's diagnosis - if X symptoms, prescribe Y solution

options.label: Know It, Not Documented
options.description: I know which products fit which customers

options.label: Need to Create Framework
options.description: Don't have clear prescription rules yet

anchor_upsell.validation_intro: Anchor Upsell uses premium pricing psychology to make your main offer feel like a bargain. Let's design your anchor strategy.

questions.text: What premium offer will you present FIRST at 5-10x your main price?
questions.help_text: This must be legitimate value, not a fake tier

questions.text: What is your 'rescue' offer after the premium gasp?
questions.help_text: This is your actual main offer - should be 1/5 to 1/10 the premium price

questions.text: How comfortable are you with 'the gasp' moment when customers see premium price?
questions.help_text: This is a critical moment - need confidence to hold the anchor

options.label: Very Comfortable
options.description: I can confidently present premium pricing

options.label: Somewhat Comfortable
options.description: Can do it but need practice

options.label: Need Training/Scripts
options.description: Want to do it, need guidance

rollover_upsell.validation_intro: Rollover Upsell is Hormozi's most-used strategy. Let's identify which of the 4 rollover scenarios fits your business best.

questions.text: Which customer segment will you target with Rollover Upsell?
questions.help_text: Rollover works in 4 scenarios - pick your primary target

options.label: Dormant/Old Customers (Re-engage)
options.description: Customers who bought before but went quiet

options.label: Upset/Unhappy Customers (Rescue)
options.description: Your own customers who are dissatisfied

options.label: Current Happy Customers (Upsell)
options.description: Active customers ready for next level

questions.text: What will you credit from their previous purchase?
questions.help_text: You'll roll this amount toward the higher-tier offer

options.label: Refund Amount (If Upset)
options.description: For upset customers, credit their refund
examples: Wanted $500 refund, credit toward better solution

questions.text: What higher-tier offer will they roll into (must be 4x+ higher)?
questions.help_text: This is the premium solution worth the upgrade

usage_notes.when_to_show: After user completes initial 10 questions and receives their top 2 recommended offers
usage_notes.purpose: Validate the recommendation and gather implementation details specific to each offer type
usage_notes.scoring_impact: These answers don't change the recommendation, they help customize the implementation strategy
